HOME_12: APY is denominated in terms of sKCS, not USD. The calculation is based on the sKCS/KCS exchange rate 2 days ago, it is not a guaranteed or promised return or profit. APY = (exchange price at this time - exchange price 48 hours ago)*180*100%

STAKE_7: Stake KCS and receive sKCS as a certificate of staking
STAKE_15: The "pending amount" refers to the amount of sKCS being unstaked, which usually takes 3-6 days. Once complete, you can withdraw KCS by tapping the "Withdraw" button.
STAKE_24: How do I get my staking rewards?
STAKE_25: sKCS represents your staked KCS and your rewards from KCS.
STAKE_26: You do not need to claim your rewards, sKCS you holds enables you to withdraw more KCS when you unstake sKCS.
STAKE_28: Can I unstake my sKCS at any time?
STAKE_29: Default sKCS unstaking period takes around 3-6 days to process, the timeline entirely depends on staking protocol. Everything is transparent.
STAKE_30: After applying for unstake, the amount will be shown in 'Pending Amount' and you can withdraw KCS once the mount goes to 'Available Withdraw Amount'.
STAKE_32: The sKCS token will have a range of use cases in the KCC ecosystem. They allow you to access DeFi market while enjoying your staking rewards and helping the network. For example:
STAKE_33: Borrowing/Lending - sKCS can be used as collateral or borrowed on multiple platforms.
STAKE_55: You will receive {{totalKSC}} for unstaking {{inputValue}} sKCS.
STAKE_67: Default sKCS unstaking period takes around 3-6 days to process, you can withdraw it after that. The withdrawable amount is net of a {{fee}}% rewards commission fee.
STAKE_69: This fee applies to staking rewards only, and is NOT taken from your staked amount, it is a fee on earnings only.
STAKE_76: Stake KCS and receive sKCS as a certificate to earn staking rewards with high APY
STAKE_84: Trade on DEXs - sKCS is available on most decentralized exchanges and can be traded for other crypto tokens. Remember, by trading your sKCS, you also trade your accumulated rewards.
